title: Quick 'n easy grape salad
ingredients: ['For the salad', '600g seedless grapes', '2 tablespoons finely chopped parsley', '250ml fresh squeezed lemon juice', '1 tablespoon lemon zest', '2 teaspoons honey', 'For the dressing', '500ml (16 fl oz) grape juice', '3 tablespoons honey', '5 tablespoons mayonnaise', '4 tablespoons freshly squeezed lemon juice', 'Water, as needed']
